titleInfo.title: Issue Identification for Urban Livability Program

originInfo.publisher: National Round Table on the Environment and the Economy

mods.abstract: The purpose of this paper is to provide some initial background information on potential areas that could be explored by NRTEE under the mandate of its urban livability program.
